    Emission Factor Library

    Emission-Factor-Library.Rmd


    The Emission Factor Library is a central piece of ghgtools. The following document details the coverage of the emission factor library and provides guidance on how to organize your activity data accordingly.


    Years Covered

    ef_activeyear
    2023


    Scope 1 & 2 Service Types Covered

    service_type emission_category
    Aviation Gasoline Mobile
    Biodiesel (100%) Mobile
    Compressed Natural Gas (CNG) Mobile
    Diesel Fuel Mobile
    Ethanol (100%) Mobile
    Kerosene-Type Jet Fuel Mobile
    Liquefied Natural Gas (LNG) Mobile
    Liquefied Petroleum Gases (LPG) Mobile
    Motor Gasoline Mobile
    Residual Fuel Oil Mobile
    Asphalt and Road Oil Stationary
    Aviation Gasoline Stationary
    Butane Stationary
    Butylene Stationary
    Crude Oil Stationary
    Distillate Fuel Oil No. 1 Stationary
    Distillate Fuel Oil No. 2 Stationary
    Distillate Fuel Oil No. 4 Stationary
    Ethane Stationary
    Ethylene Stationary
    Heavy Gas Oils Stationary
    Isobutane Stationary
    Isobutylene Stationary
    Kerosene Stationary
    Kerosene-Type Jet Fuel Stationary
    Liquefied Petroleum Gases (LPG) Stationary
    Lubricants Stationary
    Motor Gasoline Stationary
    Naphtha (<401 deg F) Stationary
    Natural Gas Stationary
    Natural Gasoline Stationary
    Other Oil (>401 deg F) Stationary
    Pentanes Plus Stationary
    Petrochemical Feedstocks Stationary
    Propane Stationary
    Propylene Stationary
    Residual Fuel Oil No. 5 Stationary
    Residual Fuel Oil No. 6 Stationary
    Special Naphtha Stationary
    Unfinished Oils Stationary
    Used Oil Stationary
    Steam Indirect Energy
    Chilled Water Indirect Energy
    Electricity Indirect Energy


    Scope 3 Categories Covered

    emission_category
    Purchased Goods and Services
    Capital Goods
    Business Travel
    Employee Commuting
    Waste Generated in Operations
